126223.「……だし しばらく……も してないなぁ。\n うーん よしっ。次は 港のある町:
...Seems like I'm a little out of practice.
Hmm, alright.
Next, I'll try a town with a harbor!

126226.「あたたた……。すまない。 \n 考え事をしながら 飛んではいけないね。\n 君:
Owwww... Sorry.
Guess I shouldn't be flying when my head's in
the clouds, huh? Are you alright?

126227.「それはよかった。私は サンビタリア。 \n 見ての通りの 妖精さ。\n しかー:
Glad you're okay. I'm Sanvitalia.
I'm a fairy, as you can plainly see.
But I'm also...a seasoned adventurer!

126228.「へ？ 妖精が なんでこんなところにって？ \n というか 君こそ ここがどこだ:
Huh?
"What's a fairy doing in a place like this?"
Don't you even know where you are?

126229.「ここは 夢と現実の境界さ。\n 元来 ここに 意識ある<pc_race>が\n:
This is the boundary between dreams and
reality. Naturally, it's quite strange for a
conscious <pc_race> to be here.

126230.「私は たまに 思考を巡らせるために\n この空間を利用するんだ。今日は何をしよ:
Sometimes I use this space to think.
What'll I do today, what should I have for
lunch, that sort of thing!

126231.「……ふむ。どうやら 冒険者のようだが…… \n なかなか 興味深いね。\n 君:
...Hmm.
Seems you're an adventurer as well.
That's interesting. What's your name?

126233.<if_woman>「よし！ <pc>ちゃん \n ここで会ったのも 妖精の女王:
Right then! The Fairy Queen guided us here
here together for a reason!
Please help me fulfill my mission!

126234.「私は みんなをハッピーにするべく \n 各地を冒険して そこに住まう人たちや\:
I'm traveling the world to make everyone happy
by inspiring adventurers and the locals to get
to know each other.

126235.「人と人とのふれあいこそが ハッピー！ \n 会話をして 笑ったり 助け合ったり:
The connections between people are what make us happy! Having conversations, laughing together, helping one another, and forming
bonds are the sources of everyone's happiness!

126236.「……つまりだ。君には\n 私が選んだ アストルティアにいる住人たちを\n 見つ:
...In short, I want you to find and talk to
the inhabitants of Astoltia that I've chosen!

126237.「そのためには 準備が必要だね……。:
And for that, you need to be prepared,
right...?

126239.<if_woman>「君には 黄色い魔法……出会いの魔法をかけた。 \n これで:
I cast a Spell of Yellow Meetings on you.
Now you'll see the names of people I've chosen
in yellow!

126240.「これで あとは 黄色い名前の人を\n 見つけて 話しかけるだけ！\n どうだい:
Now all you have to do is find people with
yellow names and talk to them!
How easy is that?

126241.「手伝ってもらうんだ。何かお礼をしないとな。\n ……そうだね。ひとりに 話しか:
Since you're helping me, I should give you something in return. ...Right then, how about this?
I'll give you a Mini Medal every time you speak with someone I've chosen.

126242.「さらに 話した人数に応じて\n 追加でご褒美だって あげちゃうぞ！\n どうだ:
Plus, I'll even throw in extra prizes based on
the total number of people you've talked to!
Doesn't that sound great?<yesno><close>

126243.「君は じつに 素直でいいね。\n ますます 気に入ったよ。\n そうだ これも:
You're a really agreeable person, aren't you?
I'm liking you more by the second. Oh yeah, I
should give you this, too.

126244.「まぁまぁ そう言わずに。楽しくいこうぜ。\n そうだ これも渡しておかないとな:
Come on now, don't say that. It'll be fun.
Oh yeah, I should give you this, too.

126246.「かわいいだろう。私のと おそろいだぞ！\n しかも この２冊は 書いたものが\:
Cute, yeah? And it even matches mine!
What's more, these two books have an amazing feature that links what's written in them with each other!

126247.<if_woman>「私がこっちに アストルティアの住人を\n 書くと <pc>:
If I write the names of the people of Astoltia
in here, they'll also be listed in the one I
gave you.

126248.「私が選んだ 住人の名前を記入しておくので\n どうぐの だいじなものから\n:
I'll fill in the names of the people I've
chosen, so you can check them out anytime
from your Key Items.

126249.「私は 当面 港町レンドアの船着き場にいる。\n 気が向いたら 会いにくるといい:
I'll be at the dock in the port town of Lendor
for the time being, so come see me if you feel
like it. Be seeing ya!

126250.「私は 当面 この町の船着き場にいる。\n 気が向いたら 会いにくるといい。\n:
I'll be at the dock here in town for the time
being, so come see me if you feel like it.
Be seeing ya!

126251.<color_yellow>サンビタリアが かけた魔法で\n特定の人たちの名前が:
<color_yellow>Sanvitalia has cast a spell on you that makes
certain people's names yellow. Try to find
them and talk to them.
